topic.title: EMS Past Medical History Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.19"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10059)/@code="67842-5" EMS Past Medical History Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10058)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Past Medical History" (CONF:10060)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10062)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67793-0" Has the patient had any significant medical conditions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10067)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10068)
If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "Refused " or "Unable to Complete," the value should be "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "None Reported," the value should be FALSE. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 has proper values, the value should be TRUE.
This entry MAY contain zero or more [0..*] observation
Such observations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10070)/@code="68487-8" EMS History of Condition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10069)
Such observations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10072), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:10071)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08 If NEMSIS EHistory.08 is "No bleeding disorder," the value should be the appropriate ICD-10 code (D66, D67, D68) and negationIndicator should be TRUE.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10063)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry Contains exactly one [1..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10073)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] procedure (CONF:10077)
This procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS) (CONF:10076)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08
This organizer MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedure
This procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS) (CONF:10076)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10059)/@code="67842-5" EMS Past Medical History Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10058)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Past Medical History" (CONF:10060)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10062)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67793-0" Has the patient had any significant medical conditions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10067)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10068)
If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "Refused " or "Unable to Complete," the value should be "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "None Reported," the value should be FALSE. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 has proper values, the value should be TRUE.
This entry MAY contain zero or more [0..*] observation
Such observations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10070)/@code="68487-8" EMS History of Condition (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10069)
Such observations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10072), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:10071)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08 If NEMSIS EHistory.08 is "No bleeding disorder," the value should be the appropriate ICD-10 code (D66, D67, D68) and negationIndicator should be TRUE.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10063)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry Contains exactly one [1..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10073)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] procedure (CONF:10077)
This procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS) (CONF:10076)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08
This organizer MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] procedure
This procedure SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4 ICD-10 PCS) (CONF:10076)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory. 08

body.codeblock: <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="1888055134"/> <code code="668211223"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <text/> <entry> <observation> <code code="68487-8" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS History of Condition"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1140936396"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <organizer> <statusCode code="completed"/> <component/> <component/> </organizer> </entry> </section>
